doc.summary: Returns a <ref cls="java/util/stream/Stream">Stream</ref> of <ref cls="net/minecraft/world/item/ItemStack">item stacks</ref> to add to a creative tab.
doc.text: Returns a <ref cls="java/util/stream/Stream">Stream</ref> of <ref cls="net/minecraft/world/item/ItemStack">item stacks</ref> to add to a creative tab.

doc.summary: Can be implemented on items to provide custom logic on how <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/creativetab/CreativeTabX">CreativeTabX</ref> should fill them by default.
doc.text: Can be implemented on items to provide custom logic on how <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/creativetab/CreativeTabX">CreativeTabX</ref> should fill them by default.  Both <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/base/ItemBase">ItemBase</ref> and the block item generated by <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/base/BlockBase">BlockBase</ref> implement this by default.
